attributes.additional_details: To tax hat makers unless their accessible to all people neurotyipacal and neurodivirgent
attributes.background: Force hat companies to make more accessible hats for the disability community

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

It's up to clothes manufacturers what types of hats to produce, and tax is already charged on any clothes (including hats) that are produced for adults.
